scripts.test: npm run tsjs && npx web-ext lint --ignore-files=tsconfig.json package.json package-lock.json images README.md */*.ts ignored
scripts.build: npm run tsjs && npx web-ext build --ignore-files=tsconfig.json package.json package-lock.json images README.md */*.ts ignored --overwrite-dest
scripts.start: npm run tsjs && npx web-ext run --browser-console -f thunderbird
scripts.startBeta: npm run tsjs && npx web-ext run --browser-console -f $THUNDERBIRD_BETA/thunderbird
scripts.start60: npm run tsjs && npx web-ext run --browser-console -f $THUNDERBIRD_60/thunderbird
scripts.start68: npm run tsjs && npx web-ext run --browser-console -f $THUNDERBIRD_68/thunderbird
